name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roku Channel Skipper: Skip ads, intros

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip ads, intros and click next episode button on Roku Channel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to skip all intros and ads when watching Roku Channel series.

Save your time, muscles and keyboard buttons! 
One click to play all series episodes in a row without a single move from the couch. 

Add Roku Channel Skipper to your browser to automatically:
➡️ Skip all intros
➡️ Fast-forward through ads
➡️ Go to the next episode

One extension to play all episodes of your favorite series in a row smoothly. All you need to do is to add the extension to your browser, switch on skipping options using toggles and log into your Roku Channel account. You are ready to binge series all night. It is as simple as that!

No unnecessary clicking when watching Roku Channel series anymore!

How does it work?
Skipper automatically clicks ""skip"" buttons which appear while watching. Please note that this extension was developed and tested for the English version only. It may not work for other languages or if the ""skip"" button is not available by default.

❗**Disclaimer: All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension holds no association or affiliation with them or any third-party companies.**❗
